# Scenario Title

## Context

Describe the situation, goals, and stakeholders. Keep it realistic and bounded.

## Ambiguities

List what is unclear, missing, contradictory, or potentially risky.

## Clarifying Questions

Write the questions you would ask first, and what each question would unlock.

## Trade-offs Analysis

Compare 2–3 plausible options. Focus on why you might choose each one.

## Structured Reasoning

Present a crisp, top-down reasoning narrative (constraints → options → decision → risks).

## Reflections

Capture what you’d do differently next time, and what you learned.
